channel.title: Flawless|24/7|Construction|DUNG|Fullscreen|AdvancedSkilling|GreatHome|
channel.description:
[img]http://i307.photobucket.com/albums/nn295/deven_053/cooltext978348365.png[/img]
Home - www.flawless2006.comuv.com/forums/ Webclient - www.flawless2006.comuv.com/webclient.html VOTE4cash - www.flawless2006.comuv.com/vote.php Desktop Client www.flawless2006.comuv.com/client.jar
Features FULLSCREEN CLIENT WE HAVE CONSTRUCTION CHECK PICTURES :)! Yes we are looking for staff, Please do not ask i will hand pick players who deserve it. 25 Functional Skills including summoning & Construction & Dungeonneering Curse Prayers working 100% Custom donator zone 10 Boss Locations (Godwars, Tormented Demons, Daggonoths, Corporel Beast, and Jad, KQ, To many to name!!!!) 8 Minigames (Duel Arena, Barrows, Pest Control, Fight Pits and Warriors' Guild , Assault, RFD , Nomad & Angry Goblin) A server built for a strong economy A Custom Safe Pk (You don't lose items.) Many Player vs Player Locations Dungeons for players to train and slay Full Pk point system with rewards Webclient Custom Skilling Area's
Future Updates Vote4points/cash - ADDED More bosses - ADDED Much More

Desktop Client www.flawless2006.comuv.com/client.jar

Features
FULLSCREEN CLIENT
WE HAVE CONSTRUCTION CHECK PICTURES :)!
Yes we are looking for staff, Please do not ask i will hand pick players who deserve it.
25 Functional Skills including summoning & Construction & Dungeonneering
Curse Prayers working 100%
Custom donator zone
10 Boss Locations (Godwars, Tormented Demons, Daggonoths, Corporel Beast, and Jad, KQ, To many to name!!!)
8 Minigames (Duel Arena, Barrows, Pest Control, Fight Pits and Warriors’ Guild , Assault, RFD , Nomad & Angry Goblin)
A server built for a strong economy
A Custom Safe Pk (You don’t lose items.)
Many Player vs Player Locations
Dungeons for players to train and slay
Full Pk point system with rewards
Webclient
Custom Skilling Area’s

Future Updates
Vote4points/cash - ADDED
More bosses - ADDED
Much More

So much more guy’s join and see!
